name: One Of A Hundred
critFlavor: As you rip the arm away, you feel power brimming!
critResponse: Gain +2 RageIcon

name: The Runt
critFlavor: You've destroyed a weak support arm riddled with sirenshell slivers. The monster is left wide open!
critResponse: During the second ability window, place 2 additional Opening or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool

name: Right Mighty Fist
critFlavor: The fingers break and puncture the skin, turning the fist into a bloody mash
critResponse: Hekaton gains 1 negative PrecisionIcon token

name: Left Mighty Fist
critFlavor: As the rain of cut giant fingers falls upon you, you feel baptized
critResponse: Gain 1 positive PrecisionIcon token

name: Right Shield Fist
critFlavor: The maze plate breaks like shattered glass, revealing the fleshy insides
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, when attacked from a Rear space, the Hekaton has -1 ATIcon

name: Left Shield Fist
critFlavor: The hardened skin of the mazeflesh parts under your attack, revealing a sirenshell splinter. The monster is wide open for a follow up!
critResponse: Gain 1 Ancient Shell Rare resource. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Shoulderhands
critFlavor: You hack at the outer layer of hand, the fall to the ground like dead leeches
critResponse: Disable Hekaton's Pushbacks

name: Exposed Back Arms
critFlavor: Your strike goes through the protective arms and punctures the drum-heart
critResponse: Deal an additional Single Wound

name: Calcified Maze Plates

effects.effect: Gain DangerIcon equal to the Primordial LVL

critFlavor: You rip the massive maze plate of the giant as if you would a fingernail
critResponse: Gain the Shieldblade GearIcon card (Secret Deck 2, card 10), AdversaryIcon!

name: Knuckle Teeth

effects.effect: Gain DangerIcon equal to the Primordial LVL

critFlavor: You don't knock these teeth out, you cleave them clean!
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Muscular Biceps Thighs
critFlavor: A giant gash leaves the Primordial bleeding black fluids and limping
critResponse: Hekaton gains 1 negative ToHitIcon token

name: Hand-Feet
critFlavor: You break several of the tiny hands that keep the monster balanced
critResponse: Hekaton gains 1 negative SpeedIcon token

name: One In A Hundred
critFlavor: As you cut the arm at the elbow, you notice it is different. Blackened from decay but somehow more human
critResponse: Deal an additional Single Wound

name: Corruption's Root
critFlavor: You've ripped the labyrinthine root out! Without it, the monster curls into a ball and dies
critResponse: The Hekaton dies!

name: Hand-Head
critFlavor: You've smashed the hand-head!
critResponse: Hekaton gains 2 negative PrecisionIcon tokens. Until the end of Battle, all AI cards target a random Titan in range

name: Drum-Heart
critFlavor: You've stabbed the drumming heart!
critResponse: At the start of each of the following Primordial Rounds, roll a d10. On a 7+ the Hekaton gains a Single Wound, then Escalate 1 and immediately end the Primordial Round

name: Spinal Finger Column
critFlavor: You cut at the column of fingers and see the monster convulse in pain
critResponse: Disable Hekaton's Zone Attacks

name: Humanity
critFlavor: You've destroyed the only thing that kept this monster in check
critResponse: Hekaton gains 1 positive DangerIcon token, 1 positive d10Icon token and 1 positive PrecisionIcon token. After the fight resolve the No Mercy for the Centimanes Special Event

name: Eroded Breastplate
critFlavor: Your weapon penetrates the bronze breastplate and sinks into a fleshy organ
critResponse: Deal an additional Single Wound! Add the Gaze of Temenos card to the BP deck

name: Plated Beasthead
critFlavor: The bronze head shatters into a thousand tiny pieces, revealing a megalithic skull hidden beneath
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Hidemail
critFlavor: With a screech, you tear a long sheet of the bronze armor, enough to create some footing
critResponse: Create a Vantage Point. If the VP is already in play, in the second ability window place 1 negative ATIcon token in the Kratos Pool

name: Underbelly Seal
critFlavor: You destroy the waxy seal and the air fills with a putrid smell. A black fluid pours out of the opening
critResponse: One Argonaut may lose the Mazetouched Affliction

name: Armored Hind Leg
critFlavor: The armor plate on the hind leg bends and breaks under the strength of your attack.,
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, when attacked from any of the Weakspots spaces, the Labyrinthauros has -1 ATIcon

name: Armored Front Leg
critFlavor: You dent the armor plate covering a front leg, making it easier to hit the hind one!
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, when attacked from any of the WeakspotIcon spaces, the Labyrinthauros has -1 ToHitIcon

name: Reinforced Skull
critFlavor: You smash the reinforced skull and a snake-like appendage emerges from the gaping hole. This is no automaton
critResponse: Create a VP. If the VP is already in play, in the second ability window place 1 negative ATIcon token in the Kratos Pool

name: Exposed Mechanism
critFlavor: You destroy part of the hydraulic mechanism that seemingly allows the automaton to move. It doesn't even slow it down... but creates some footing
critResponse: Create a VP. If the VP is already in play, in the second ability window place 1 negative ATIcon token in the Kratos Pool

name: Servomotors
critFlavor: You rip part of the leg mechanism away and a slimy substance takes its place!
critResponse: Gain the Mazemace GearIcon card (Secret Deck 2, card 12), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Hydraulic Pump
critFlavor: You've destroyed a vital part of the mechanism
critResponse: Labyrinthauros gains 1 negative SpeedIcon token

name: Maze Fragment

effects.effect: One Argonaut may lose the Mazetouched Affliction

critFlavor: You've broken the maze fragment that wormed its way among the mechanisms
critResponse: Gain 1 Maze Fragment resource. Each time Labryinthauros moves 4 or more spaces, roll a d10. On 8+ it stops after 4 spaces

name: Peculiar Growth
critFlavor: You hack at the growth covering the automaton
critResponse: Gain the Glimmer Shroud GearIcon card (Secret Deck 2, card 12), AdversaryIcon!

name: Hammerhead Worm Head
critFlavor: You cut the snail head and watch as it wriggles on the ground, convulsing
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Will Of Temenos

effects.effect: One Argonaut may lose the Mazetouched Affliction
Draw and perform an AI card against the Attacker

critFlavor: For a brief moment only fear exists. Then you feel your weapon plunge into something immaterial and you're free. You've severed the link!
critResponse: Without it, the Primordial dies

name: Shapeless Form

effects.effect: One Argonaut may lose the Mazetouched Affliction

critFlavor: The slithery body shudders when you slice it open
critResponse: Create a VP. If the VP is already in play, in the second ability window place 1 negative ATIcon token in the Kratos Pool

name: Restless Tentacles
critFlavor: The slimy sensory tentacles embrace you. Your mind fills with images of dread and the heart of the Maze... only then do you rip them out!
critResponse: Gain +1 ProgressIcon

name: Otherworldly Whiskers
critFlavor: These whiskers stretch to places beyond space and time... and yet they are not out of your reach
critResponse: Until the end of Battle you may ignore all Primordial Responses

name: Shard Of The Labyrinth
critFlavor: Deep inside the bronze casin and the fleshy tissue a living shard of the Maze shapechanges constantly. You smash it to pieces!
critResponse: Disable the Labyrinth X keyword

name: Fleshy Tentacle
critFlavor: You cut off one of the long tentacles.\sAs it wiggles on the ground, you are emboldened to push forward
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. you may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Meaty Tentacle

effects.effect: All Titans in Zone 1 gain +1 DangerIcon and suffer Knockdown

critFlavor: The tentacle splits in two, spraying the surrounding area with black ichor
critResponse: Deal an additonal Single Wound!

name: Leg Trunk
critFlavor: You've hacked deep into one of the thick trunks the creature is standing on!
critResponse: During the second ability window, place 2 additional Opening or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool

name: Sensory Pyramid
critFlavor: The pyramid cracks like an egg. Bodies start falling from its hollowed out insides
critResponse: Search the BP deck and choose 1 card to set aside. After Escalation, place the set aside card on top of the BP deck

name: Maze Seed
nonResponseText: If your Weapon has the Spear Trait, immediately place 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool
critFlavor: A living shard of the true Labyrinth, once seeded it would grow and consume the world. Not this time
critResponse: Create a VP

name: Joint Maze Carapace
critFlavor: You shatter a large fragment of the maze carapace, exposing a vital organ
critResponse: During Escalation, choose which BP II card to add to the deck

name: Maze Plate
critFlavor: You crack the giant maze plate and grab a fragment as a trophy!
critResponse: Gain the Temeno Scale Shield Cycle 2 GearIcon card, AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Small Pyramid
nonResponseText: If your Weapon has the Spear Trait, immediately place 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool

effects.effect: All Titans in Zone 1 gain +1 DangerIcon and suffer Knockdown

critFlavor: You destroy one of the pyramids and the Temenos lets out an inhuman wail
critResponse: Create a VP

name: Hardened Maze Carapace
critFlavor: You hit the carapace with all your might, your hands tremble, your muscles spasm - but the shell has been cracked!
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, when you attack from the 3 front adjacent spaces, Temeno has -1 ATIcon

name: Hind Maze Carapace
critFlavor: You tear away one of the maze plates on the back and the creature shakes visibly
critResponse: Discard all Despair tokens from each Titan

name: Large Pyramid
nonResponseText: If your Weapon has the Spear Trait, immediately place 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool

effects.effect: All Titans in Zone 1 gain +1 DangerIcon and suffer Knockdown

critFlavor: You slice of the pyramid's tip, the giant maze fragment falls to the ground with a defeaning thud
critResponse: Create a VP

name: Leading Tentacle

effects.effect: All Titans on Labyrinth tiles gain +2 FateIcon

critFlavor: You crush one of the leading tentacles with a satisfying smack
critResponse: Remove 3 Labyrinth tiles from the Board

name: Grand Commisure
critFlavor: You shatter the grand commisure and the creature almost splits in two!
critResponse: Deal an additonal Single Wound!

name: Maw Of Madness
nonResponseText: If you have the Impossible Logic Boon, automatically gain a Crit Chance. You may voluntarilty end this Attack before performing a Power Roll. If you do, clear the Kratos Pool
critFlavor: You've jumped into the endless maw and struck at the heart of hearts
critResponse: Temenos dies!

name: Fear Gland
critFlavor: You look at the miniscule organ that caused so much misery, then crush it like a bug
critResponse: Each Titan discards all negative Condition cards and modifier tokens. Gain the Pyramidion Cycle 2 GearIcon card (Secret Deck 5, card 46), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Contraction Center
critFlavor: You strike at the gordian knot of tissue, muscles and ligaments reaching far beyond this world and cut it clean
critResponse: Temenos gains 1 negative ATIcon token. Disable Routine

name: Eimerian Tentacle Cluster

effects.effect: All Titans in Zone 2 gain +1 DangerIcon and suffer Knockdown

critFlavor: You sever the link between the cluster and the rest of the body, effectively making the Primordial blind
critResponse: Temenos gains 1 negative PrecisionIcon token. Until the end of battle, all AI cards target the closest Titan

name: Gate Brain
nonResponseText: You may voluntarily end this Attack before performing a Power Roll. If you do, clear the Kratos Pool
critFlavor: There was a gate here to the other side and you closed it shut! Yet a memory lingers..
critResponse: Temenos cannot place Labyrinth tiles. At the end of Battle resolve The Gate Special Event

name: Wiry Leg
critFlavor: You crush the monster's knee, bringing it to the ground
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Hind Pincer

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You break one of the hind pincers, pushing the Pursuer into the defensive
critResponse: During the second ability window, place 2 additional Opening or Break tokens in the Kratos Pool

name: Abnormally Long Arm
critFlavor: Black blood from the gaping wounds splashes all over you!
critResponse: Gain +2 RageIcon

name: Arm Pincer

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You rip the pincer out! Pursuer's laughter grows more intense
critResponse: Gain the Nail Spear GearIcon card (Secret Deck 2, card 17)!

name: Large Moth Wing
critFlavor: The winds are harder than they look, almost as if they were sculpted in stone, but you still manage to punch a small hole in one of them
critResponse: Pursuer gains 1 negative ToHitIcon token

name: Small Moth Wing

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You tear one of the small wings away and for a moment you are transported into a different place and time
critResponse: Gain +1 Mnemos node for a chosen Mnemos

name: Abnormally Small Head

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You rip the head away, but there's a smaller one underneath it!
critResponse: Deal and additional Signle Wound! Disable the Toying Trait

name: Stone Beak

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You smash the large stone beak, sending thousands of splinters into the Pursuer's body
critResponse: Gain the Vulture Mask GearIcon card (Secret deck 2, card 18)!

name: Back Ridges

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You cut deep into what you think is the monster's spinal column
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, Pursuer has -1 ATIcon if Attacked from its Blindspot spaces

name: Muscular Abdomen
critFlavor: You slash the monster's belly, releasing its horrific contents: dozens of half-digested bodies
critResponse: Discard all Ambrosia tokens from each Titan

name: Abnormally Broad Shoulders

effects.effect: Pursuer moves to the center of the Board, turns to face the most Titans and performs Signature

critFlavor: You strike the monster's broad shoulders, cutting muscles and crushing bones
critResponse: Another Titan may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Small Wing Fin
critFlavor: With a precise attack, you leave the fin in tatters, making the monster lose balance
critResponse: Pursuer gains 1 negative PrecisionIcon token

name: Crooked Head

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card
Draw and resolve an AI card

critFlavor: You behead the monstrosity, yet it still walks

name: Dangerless Eye

effects.effect: Draw and resolve and AI card

critFlavor: You gouge out the lifeless eye! You keep it as a trophy

name: Ambrosia Font

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You destroy the Ambrosia paunch, black liquid splutters all around

name: Flight Nerve Center

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You puncture the gravity gland and the Primordial slumps to the ground, no longer held in the air by powers eldritch

name: Hidden Wings

effects.effect: Immediately draw and resolve a Flare card

critFlavor: You slit the wings hidden deep in the folds of the monster's back

name: Black-Blood Cryptex
critFlavor: You break through the hardened ambrosia shell and strike at the black heart of the Pursuer... it's a small, black cryptex

name: Right Maul

effects.effect: You dull your Weapon on the black-ironed mauls! Gain +1 RageIcon, exhaust your active Weapon

critFlavor: You damage the chain mechanism hidden in the Primordial's forearm!
critResponse: Disable Cyclonus Range Attacks

name: Monstrous Foot

effects.effect: Cyclonus moves 4 spaces directly away from the Attacker (without turning)

critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Mighty Pectoral Muscle
critFlavor: You tear into the Cyclonus' enormous muscles and though there seems to be no end to them, you're sure you've made a difference

name: Ancilliary Cage Armor

name: Bulging Biceps
critFlavor: You cut through the biceps' tendons as if you were cutting through a spider's web

effects.effect: Your Weapon gets stuck in the muscles

critResponse: Gain +1 Humanity. Gain +1 Mnemos node for a chosen Mnemos

name: Powerful Jaw

effects.effect: Hidden Spartan Warriors attack you from the temple

effects.effect: A sole Spartan Warrior dive attacks you from the top of the statue

critFlavor: Your mighty blow knocks down one of the columns and the rest fall like dominoes! Stone blocks fall to the ground with defeaning thuds, making paths across the vast wastes of ambrosia

name: Macrophages
nonResponseText: Corrosive If you're adjacent or on a VP, you may be immediately Absorbed
critFlavor: You strike deep, breaking stone and spattering black ambrosia left and right. But this ambrosia is somehow different, thicker and blacker still. It seems to metabolize its more common cousin

name: Osteoclast Colony
nonResponseText: Supersolid

effects.effect: The Chimera consolidates its AT field
Remove 1 Single Wound from the Secondary Wound Stack

name: Defiled Naos

effects.effect: The gods that haunt these halls scorn you
Each Titan loses -2 FateIcon and gains a node for 1 Fated Mnemos

name: Thymus
nonResponseText: Gelatinous If you're adjacent or on a VP, you may be immediately Absorbed

effects.effect: Draw and resolve the top AI card

name: Cancerous Core

critResponse: Gain +1 Humanity. The Chimera dies

effects.effect: You shatter your Weapon on the thick black skin! Gain +1 RageIcon, exhaust your active Weapon

name: Black-Muscled Abdomen

effects.effect: Your Weapon gets stuck among the muscles

critFlavor: You deal a mortal wound that would slay a lesser creature. The Nietzschean brushes it off as if it was nothing... or maybe it is something? He seems slightly slower
critResponse: The Nietzschean gains 1 negative ToHitIcon token

name: Ambrosial Vesicle
critFlavor: You smash the vesicle secreting ambrosia. A patch of the refined substance latches onto your skin, temporarily boosting your strength
critResponse: Unexhaust all of your GearIcon and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Hardened Ambrosial Skin
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance
critFlavor: You hack at the thick black skin, peeling it layer by layer. Even flayed, it still moves..
critResponse: Gain the Umbral Virus GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 175), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Mask Of Smoke

effects.effect: The Nietzschean moves 4 spaces directly away from the Attacker (without turning)

critFlavor: You shatter the illusion of the armored face, revealing the grotesque skullface beneath!
critResponse: Disable the Hardened effect

name: Faces Of Defeat

effects.effect: Gain +1 RageIcon, 1 Ambrosia token and the Hatred Condition card
The Nietzschean moves 5 spaces directly away from the Attacker (without turning)

critFlavor: You've faced the ashen visages and came through stronger than ever!
critResponse: Permanently gain +1 Courage and +1 Precision (once per Argonaut Lifetime)

name: Inscribed Ribcage
critFlavor: You crush the inscribed bones, collapsing the ribcage. A lesser creature would die instantly; the Nietzschean just coughs black ash. The thick curl of smoke sticks to your right arm
critResponse: Gain the Fumeblade GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 178). AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Black Bones
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance. Prisoners!
critFlavor: The broken bones rattle as they fall to the ground, revealing the osseous matter is people. The Nietzschean has built himself from the remains of his enemies
critResponse: Gain +1 Humanity. Gain +1 RageIcon, you may lose -2 FateIcon and -2 DangerIcon, then you may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Sword Graveyard

effects.effect: Your Weapon gets sucked in by the black mass! Permanently lose your active Weapon if it has a Sword or Slabsword Trait

critFlavor: You rip out one of the swords sticking out of the Nietzschean's back!
critResponse: Gain the Necroxiphos GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 177) or a Unique Weapon with a Sword or Slabsword Trait you previously had and lost or an Ascended version of such a Weapon from Cycle I. AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Blazing Muscles
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Gain +1 DangerIcon and during the second ability window place 2 additional Fire tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: You cut through the rippling muscles, cleaving a sheet of the black mass clean off
critResponse: Gain the Elephantine Armor GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 176). AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Bloodied Wool Strand

effects.effect: Gain 1 Despair token (see Cycle 1 Storybook) and +3 DangerIcon
Gain +2 RageIcon, +2 DangerIcon, and 1 Ambrosia token

critFlavor: You throw yourself into the melee with reckless abandon, slashing and thrusting, and smashing bones, and in the end you manage to rip away a piece of the Nietzschean!
critResponse: Immediately resolve the The Strand Special Event and permanently gain the following effects (once per Argonaut Lifetime): Start of Battle: Gain 1 Ambrosia token. For Awakening rolls, treat a '9' result as a '10'

name: Skullhead

effects.effect: The Nietzschean moves 4 spaces directly away from the Attacker (without turning)

critFlavor: You crack the black skull, releasing a cascade of fire and black vapor. You are seared by the heat and made stronger for it
critResponse: Your Obol threshold is permanently increased by 1 (once per Argonaut Lifetime)

name: Pygmalion Stone
critFlavor: You've ripped open the Nietzschean's body, abdomen to sternum, skin to bone. Inside you find an ivory stone
critResponse: Gain 1 Pygmalion Stone!

name: Billowing Maw
critFlavor: Some would say you cannot kill fire - and yet you quench the animated flames, until only embers remain
critResponse: Treat Fire Combos as automatically broken. Gain the Cowl of Char GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 53). AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: The Heel
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Gain +3 DangerIcon and during the second ability window place 3 additional Black tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: You plunge your weapon deep into the strange iron-sealed wound
critResponse: Immediately resolve the The Heel Special Event!

name: The Black Blade
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance
critFlavor: You break the Black Blade, its shattered fragments piercing deep into your skin, steeling you for what is to come
critResponse: Treat Sword Combos as automatically broken. Permanently gain Ambrosia Limit 5 (once per Argonaut Lifetime)

name: Ambrosial Infestation

effects.effect: Gain 2 Ambrosia tokens, then gain twice as many DangerIcon as you have Ambrosia tokens

critFlavor: You funnel the raging flames into the open wound, burning out the ambrosial infection to the very heart!
critResponse: Treat Ambrosia Combos as automatically broken

name: Charon's Frown

effects.effect: Gain as many RageIcon as there are Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: With a well-placed strike you dispel the frown on the Ferryman's face. There will be no martyrs here
critResponse: Discard the Sisyphean Condition card. You cannot gain it during this Battle!

name: Retractable Leg
critFlavor: You rip off one of the Burden's mechanical legs! It still moves as if it had a mind of its own
critResponse: Gain the Leg Khopesh GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 52)!

name: Relief Shell
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Gain as many FateIcon as there are Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: You smash the relief shell, clogging the ambrosia gutters with stone debris
critResponse: Disable the Splash Trait!

name: Hepheastum Mesh
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: As you try to break the impenetrable metal, your Weapon dulls
Until the end of Battle you gain -1 PowerIcon

critFlavor: You cut through the supposedly indestructible metal mesh with a satisfying clang
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Forgotten Names

effects.effect: Burden steals 1 of your Mnemos nodes

critFlavor: As you chip at the relief armor, time seems to slow down. A procession of names appears before you and you seem to recognize one from your past
critResponse: Gain +1 Mnemos node for a chosen Mnemos. Then, unexhaust its card or return it to play if it was discarded

name: Leg Stabilizer

effects.effect: Burden moves to the center of the Board

critFlavor: Your mighty blow destabilizes the ancient gyroscope that governs the Burden's balance
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Recount Of Failure

effects.effect: Gain as many FateIcon as there are Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: The Burden may want to recount Mortalkind's failures, but in each failure there is a lesson. On one of the reliefs, you glimpse a forgotten invention
critResponse: You may immediately research 1 CombatTechIcon or StructuralTechIcon Technology from the Projects deck!

name: Axis Allegory
critFlavor: You destroy not only the gyroscope, but also the very idea that gave it power! Without an ontological support, the Burden starts to wobble
critResponse: Disable the Sisyphus Spiral Trait!

name: Inner Shell
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance
critFlavor: You manage to pierce through the relief shell. The Burden is leaking ambrosia now!
critResponse: Place an Ambrosia Pool Terrain tile under the Burden. Deal an additional Single Wound!

name: Ambrosial Arm
critFlavor: The ambrosial arm grasps at you and you race to meet it. Your powerful attack shatters it into a thousand black droplets. In them, you see the future victory of the Argo
critResponse: Gain +1 ProgressIcon!

name: Aeacus's Grimace
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Gain DangerIcon equal to your FateIcon

critFlavor: As you hit the monster's side repeatedly, the visage of Aeacus cracks, then shatters. Stone fragments fall to the ground, a strange spherical stone among them
critResponse: Gain the Sisyphus Burden GearIcon card (Secret deck 5, card 60)!

name: Imposter's Sneer

effects.effect: Gain +2 DangerIcon and the Sisyphean Condition card

critFlavor: You slash the False King's visage until not a trace of his identity remains. Who is laughing now?
critResponse: Reset FateIcon to 0

name: Rhadamanthus's Scowl
critFlavor: You split the dour face right through the middle. From the fissure, a forgotten memory erupts, blinding you momentarily
critResponse: Gain 1 unclaimed Mnemos card from the previous Cycle. If you already have 2 Mnemos cards, the card goes to the Mnemos Vault

name: Tripod Nexus

effects.effect: Burden moves to the center of the Board

critFlavor: You destroy the mechanical part of the monster. As it shakes and rotates uncontrollably, visions pass before your and your companions' eyes
critResponse: Each Argonaut gains +1 Mnemos node for a chosen Mnemos!

name: Lacrimal Remnant

effects.effect: Gain as many DangerIcon as there are Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool

critFlavor: Under the barrage of your attacks, the relief shell fractures. One of the many visages sheds a singular clear teardrop
critResponse: Gain 1 Sisyphus Tear!

name: Hoard Of Recollections
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Burden steals 2 of your Mnemos nodes
Gain +3 FateIcon and a Fated Mnemos card

critFlavor: You rip open the Burden's undercarriage, yet not a single drop of ambrosia spills. Instead, the creature leaks stolen memories
critResponse: The Moirai Vault is broken, you regain everything that was stolen! If the Vault is empty, gain +1 ArgoKnowledgeIcon!

name: The Hidden Grin

effects.effect: Draw and perform an AI card

critFlavor: The monstrous creature seems to gloat at its inevitable victory, yet you see through that facade and wipe the smile of its face with one fateful blow
critResponse: The Burden crumbles and dies!

name: Depthless Pool
nonResponseText: Hardened This BP has +2 AT. Ignore this ability if you rolled a Crit Chance

effects.effect: Gain as many Ambrosia tokens as Power missing to successfully

critFlavor: You stare into the impenetrable blackness of the Ambrosia Pool, as if you were looking into the Abyss itself. Someone cries for help. You reach out and pull them out of the Void
critResponse: The Titan that died most recently (during any game phase) is returned to you and will be available after this Battle!

name: Fleshy Robe
critFlavor: You tear the Oracle's robe - more skin than cloth - to reveal the cosmic flesh beneath, hidden from you in a different time and place. Not hidden anymore.
critResponse: Disable the Atemporal effect.

name: Temporal Sash

effects.effect: Gain FateIcon equal to the Primordial LVL

critFlavor: As you rip the Sash, you feel yourself pulled back in time. You manage to steer yourself to an opportune moment and strike again!
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Sun-Kissed Hood
critFlavor: You cleave the creature's head right off and for a moment death claims it. Yet death has no hold here, the timeline skips and the Oracle is back. All you have to show for you ephemeral triumph is a piece of clothflesh.
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Wing Eye Colony
nonResponseText: Atemporal

effects.effect: Gain +1 FateIcon and the Muffled Condition card

critFlavor: You squish the hundreds of tiny eyes, all blinking at you in terror. In their gaze you find the past that was stolen from you.
critResponse: Gain 2 Mnemos nodes, each for a different Mnemos.

name: Right-Angled Wing

effects.effect: The Oracle moves 3 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critFlavor: You hack away one of the seemingly innumerable wings of the Oracle, opening it up for another attack.
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Wrong-Angled Wing

effects.effect: Gain FateIcon equal to the Primordial LVL
The Oracle moves 3 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critResponse: Gain +1 Frozen Time

name: Unholy Chasuble
critResponse: Disable 'The Oracle moves towards the Timefront' effects.

name: Many-Eyed Face

effects.effect: The Oracle moves 6 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critResponse: Gain the Eye of the Watcher GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 84), AdversaryActivationIcon.

name: Temporal Icicle Gland
nonResponseText: Atemporal
critResponse: You may reset FateIcon and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Sun-Burned Flange
critResponse: Move the Timefront 3 spaces backward.

name: Inner Eye Colony
critResponse: Disable the Quantum Eye Trait!

name: Living Lenses

effects.effect: The Oracle moves 6 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critResponse: Disable Double Laser Attacks.

name: Ontological Antennae

effects.effect: The Oracle moves 6 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critResponse: Disable Hypertime Oracle's Rewinds.

name: Sun-Flayed Soul

effects.effect: Gain FateIcon eual to the Primordial LVL

critResponse: The Oracle dies!

name: Voidheart
nonResponseText: Atemporal

effects.effect: Gain +2 DangerIcon and the Sisyphean Condition card

critResponse: Gain +1 ProgressIcon. After the Battle, resolve the Helionauts Special Event.

name: Invisible Eyes Parasite
critResponse: Gain the Paradox GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 85), AdversaryActivationIcon.

name: Ripen Realities
nonResponseText: Atemporal

effects.effect: Gain FateIcon equal to the Primordial LVL

critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Timeline Digestion System

effects.effect: The Oracle moves 6 spaces directly away from the Attack (without turning)
Giant Glaciate the previous Primordial space

critResponse: Remove the Timefront from the Board.

name: Sharp Talonarm
critResponse: Gain the Right Talon of Doom GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 86), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Oddment Loincloth
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Feathered Back

effects.effect: The Harpy moves to the center of the Board and turns to face the most Titans

critResponse: The Predator Traint treats 1 Bleeding token as not havin the Bleeding Condition at all.

name: Humanoid Limb
critResponse: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token. You may perform a Bonus Attack, ignoring the Rapid Adaptation Trait!

name: Exoribcage
critResponse: Discard 1 Rapid Adaptation token fromt he Battle. If there aren't any, another Titan may move up to 3 spaces and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Tentacle Appendage
critResponse: Disable the Pull X keyword on Harpy Attacks.

name: Vestigial Wing

effects.effect: The Harpy moves to the center of the Board and turns to face the most Titans

critResponse: Another Titan may move up to 3 spaces and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Tentacles Bristles
critResponse: Disable the Bleeding effects on Harpy Attacks.

name: Tentacle Muscles
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, when attacked from a Blindspot space, the Harpy has -1 ATIcon.

name: Snakespine
critResponse: Discard 1 Rapid Adaptation token fromt he Battle. If there aren't any, another Titan may move up to 4 spaces and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Wedgehead

effects.effect: The Harpy moves to the center of the Board and turns to face the most Titans

critResponse: Deal an additional Single Wound!

name: Hollow Eye

effects.effect: Gain the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token

critResponse: Disable the Muffled and Sealed Conditions. Discard all Muffled and Sealed Condition cards from Titans

name: Evolutionary Gland

effects.effect: Place an additional generic token as a Rapid Adaptation token on any space of the Icarian Adaptation Board

critResponse: Discard 1 Rapid Adaptation token fromt he Battle. If there aren't any, another Titan may move up to 5 spaces and perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Searing Sphere
critResponse: Gain the Spherecast GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 87), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: True Eyes
critResponse: The Harpy dies!

effects.effect: Harpy moves to the center of the Board and turns to face the most Titans

critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack, ignoring the Rapid Adaptation Trait!

critResponse: Create a VP. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

critResponse: Gain the Enigma of Transformation GearIcon card, AdversaryActivationIcon!

critResponse: Deal an additonal Single Wound!

name: Forewing

effects.effect: Gain FateIcon equal to the Primordial LVL

critResponse: Search the BP deck and choose 1 card to set aside. After Escalation, place the set aside card on top of the BP deck.

name: Skulljaw

effects.effect: Gain +1 FateIcon and the Muffled Condition card

critResponse: Create a VP. Until the end of Battle, when attacked from VP1, Sun Descendant has -1 ATIcon.

name: Swordwing
critResponse: Create a VP. During Escalation, choose which BP II card to add to the deck (instead of drawing randomly).

name: Aft Wing
critResponse: Gain the Icarus Lot GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 88), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Writhing Cephalomuscles
nonResponseText: If your Weapon has the Spear Trait, immediately place 1 Break token in the Kratos Pool.
critResponse: Create a VP. Until the end of Battle, when attacked from VP II or III, Sun Descendant has -1 ATIcon.

name: Feathery Carapace
nonResponseText: When you attack from VP II or III. you may initiate a Combined Attack instead.
critResponse: Disable the Quantum Eye Trait!

name: Lens-Eyes
critResponse: Until the end of Battle, Laser Attacks deal -2 DangerIcon (to a minimum of 1). You may reset your FateIcon. You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Axlebones
nonResponseText: If your Weapon has the Spear Trait, immediately place 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool. When you attack from VP II or III. you may initiate a Combined Attack instead.
critResponse: Disable the Atemporal effect.

name: Wrong-Angled Wing
critResponse: Create a VP. Disable the Time-clocked keyword.

name: Germinating Helionaut
nonResponseText: Atemporal
critResponse: The Sun Descendant dies!

name: The Wheel

name: Black Ice Shard
nonResponseText: Atemporal

effects.effect: The Sun Descendant moves 6 spaces directly away from the Attacker (without turning)

critResponse: Gain the Icarus's Fall GearIcon card (Secret deck 8, card 89), AdversaryActivationIcon!

name: Simulated Sun
nonResponseText: Atemporal
critResponse: Create a VP. Disable the Sun Descendant's Laser Attacks. After the Battle, resolve the Ton Asterion Special Event.

name: Hidden Staircase
nonResponseText: When you attack from VP II or III. you may initiate a Combined Attack instead.
critResponse: You may perform a Bonus Attack!

name: Sanctified Effigy
nonResponseText: When you attack from VP II or III. you may initiate a Combined Attack instead.
critResponse: Disable the Merciless Sun Trait.

name: Delicate Stomach
nonResponseText: Do not escalate. If this BP has been Wounded and there are no cards in the deck, see 0203

effects.effect: The Pitiless appears at the closest Sun Circle

critFlavor: You put your all into this desperate attack, striking the god just bellow the chest. You think you saw the Olympian's Muscles twitch
critResponse: Another Titan may immediately move up to their Speed and perform a Bonus Attack!
